resources.string:
Pantry - You can add anything you have on hand to your pantry to better keep track of all your food and supplies. 

Grocery List- This is a wonderful place to store everything youre going to need, the add button can make sure you keep track of what you need on your way to the store. As well as having the ability to remove items you feel you dont need anymore! 

Recipe List- This is a list of recipes that you can try out as well as making sure you pantry items are conveniently on hand.


Application Credits:
Developers:
Justin Smith
De'Angelo Rieke
